attributes.action: Severely limit or ban bonus payments to Bank executives, and if any are justified they should be in shares or options that only vest in individuals when the bank has repaid Government funds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purpose of the above is to appease public concern over the role of banks in creating the current economic climate which has required large input of rescue funds. Emergency legislation should be introduced to prevent Bank Boards creating these early payments to avoid restrictions which may be created.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
